Title: Relates to deferring certain taxes for small businesses and small landlords during the COVID-19 declared state disaster emergency and permitting installment payments thereafter
Summary: Relates to deferring certain property taxes for small businesses and small landlords during a declared state disaster emergency and providing for installment payments thereafter to be determined by the local legislative body.
LawCode: Add Art 10 ยง1000, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to special deferments and installment payments for small businesses and small landlords during the COVID-19 state of emergency
